BodyName: Committee on Cultural Affairs, Libraries and International Intergroup Relations

Items.Title: Resolution recognizing February 21 as Mother Language Day in the City of New York to honor the importance of the Bengali/Bangla language to Bangladeshis everywhere and to promote the acceptance of linguistic and cultural diversity in our communities
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Recognizing February 21 as Mother Language Day in the City of New York.

Items.Title: Resolution recognizing the accomplishments of and issues faced by Black women by designating February 15 annually as Black Girl Magic Day in the City of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Recognizing the accomplishments of and issues faced by Black women by designating February 15 annually as Black Girl Magic Day in the City of New York.

Items.Title: Resolution recognizing the contributions of Delta Sigma Theta to public service by designating March 3 annually as Delta Day in the City of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Recognizing the contributions of Delta Sigma Theta to public service by designating March 3 annually as Delta Day in the City of New York.
